title: Ambient Video Game Music - Zombie Apocalypse 2
description: Delighted to introduce the chilling sequel to our acclaimed zombie apocalypse-themed ambience packs.
longDescription:
Delighted to introduce the chilling sequel to our acclaimed zombie apocalypse-themed ambience packs. This collection of 10 packs takes the horror and suspense to an entirely new level, providing game developers with a richer palette of sounds to create an even more terrifying world overrun by the undead.


Continuing the eerie narrative of the initial collection, these packs reintroduce the horrifying ambiance of being ensnared in a room, surrounded by the ceaseless moaning and groaning of relentless undead. This time, the sounds of the shambling corpses take on a more menacing tone, with newly added elements like the unnerving creak of their approach and the spine-chilling drag of their decayed limbs.


Linking all these frightening elements is a fear-heightening soundtrack, a follow-up to its predecessor but with added layers of horror. The soundtrack flows through each moment, its ominous undertones amplifying the overall atmosphere of dread and despair, making the terrifying experience even more real and haunting.


Perfect for game developers aiming to push the boundaries of horror and suspense, this sequel provides an expanded library of terror-inducing sounds. With the evolved narrative, horrifying sounds of the undead, and a more suspenseful soundtrack, your players will be engulfed in a world where every moment is filled with terror, taking the horror gaming experience to unprecedented heights.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--


Music Preview 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AD0Kq2oQ_qE

Music Preview 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uo-Z6YL_3r8

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OSjRF7kAf_E


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
